name: Pokemon-go-webapi
tagline: Ce projet vise à fournir une interface web au projet de Tejado (https://github.com/tejado/pokemongo-api-demo), permettant de consulter des informations relatives  au jeu en réalité augmentée Pokémon GO.
body:
## What is it ? 

The target of this project is to provide a web interface de the Tejado's project, allowing to retrieve data from the Pokemon Go servers. 

## What can I do with it ? 

This project allows simple users to generate "cards" exposing their progression ingame.  

Moreover, we propose to developers a json endpoint to get data from the game. 

## How can I use it ? 

### For simple users 

The card generator is not available yet. 
 
But here is an example of what you can do with it (more data will be available in the future).

<iframe src="https://chaipokoi.github.io/Pokemon-Go-WebAPI/embed.html?params=BxAQzx0hEBbQrX38NTZqaVxuGdW4zxGIyHQ8nH6ndU8mKTwij_LJ1StlwH1YkOT96qovAg5IZxHu5UKkkwyuDA"></iframe>

### For developpers

More informations are availables in the [Github repo](https://github.com/chaipokoi/Pokemon-Go-WebAPI).
